channel.title: Compiling / Running A Server / Client Under a Linux Operating System
channel.description:
Hello, I've just recently Switched to Ubuntu Linux, As I prefer working with the opengl library and programming under the linux operating system with C++, But I`m completely new to J Programming and Private Server Development. I know how to make a .bat to Compile & Run A Server / Client In the Windows Os but not Linux.
Any Help Would be Greatly Appreciated.
Thanks, Mark LeBlanc

item.title: Compiling / Running A Server / Client Under a Linux Operating System
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

I like that you use C++. <3.

Read up on Tuts / Java tuts.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling / Running A Server / Client Under a Linux Operating System
